mapper.select: SELECT R.R_ID, R.R_CONTENT, R.R_WRITER, M.NICKNAME, R.R_REGDATE, R.BOARD_ID FROM REPLY R, MEMBER M, BOARD B WHERE R.R_WRITER = M.EMAIL AND R.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID AND B.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} ORDER BY R_REGDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(R_ID, R_CONTENT, R_REGDATE, R_WRITER, BOARD_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(R_ID),0)+1 FROM REPLY), #{r_content}, SYSDATE, #{r_writer}, #{board_id})
